Taunton.Salmon Washburn House:
The Salmon Washburn House is a historic house located at 68 Winthrop Street in Taunton, Massachusetts.


== Description and history ==
It was built in 1860 for prosperous local businessman Salmon Washburn, who ran a furniture, housewares and hardware business on Main Street. The two-story house is built on a square plan with a low-pitch hipped roof and very broad cornice.
